page.title: 04FARMING IN MINSTERLEY
page.content: Minsterley is surrounded by woods & farmland. The farms are quite big. Some farms are arable, some dairy, & some are a mixture of the two. The main crops are{wheat,barley {& oil seed rape.}The oil seed rape have bright yellow flowers.Aeroplanes or helicopters spray the fields with pesticide.It falls in huge clouds.Combine harvesters are used, & after the harvest the stubble is burned. On the farms with cattle we see {Friesians,Charolais & Limousin.}The sheep farms have{Clun or Suffolk {cross. Farmers grow{hay or}make{silage.
